page.title: 08KILDWICK PICNIC
page.content: On Saturday, June 15th 1985, over 70 people attended a picnic organised by {Kildwick Church Activities Committee.} This was a joint effort with the Methodist Chapel and in addition children from the school attended, many of them with their parents. Novelty races were run including a three legged race, sack race and relay race. Prizes were awarded to the winners of each race. Mr. Norris Webb gave a magic show and with some help from the children all his illusions came out right. Parents and children thoroughly enjoyed a game of rounders and following a break for a picnic tea, the afternoon ended with a tug of war event.
